UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd {{$FullBaseDir}} && mkdir -p rawfiles && wget -qO release.zip https://github.com/iw4x/iw4x-rawfiles/releases/latest/download/release.zip || { echo \"Download of latest IW4x raw files failed from GitHub. Aborting\"; exit 1; }; unzip -qo release.zip -d rawfiles && \cp -a rawfiles/ ./ >/dev/null 2>&1 && rm -rf rawfiles release.zip >/dev/null 2>&1"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location '{{$FullBaseDir}}'; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path 'rawfiles' *> $null; try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://github.com/iw4x/iw4x-rawfiles/releases/latest/download/release.zip' -OutFile 'release.zip' -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Error 'Download of latest IW4x raw files failed from GitHub. Aborting'; exit 1 }; Expand-Archive -Path 'release.zip' -DestinationPath 'rawfiles' -Force; Get-ChildItem 'rawfiles' -Force | ForEach-Object { Move-Item $_.FullName -Destination $PWD -Force }; Remove-Item 'rawfiles','release.zip' -Recurse -Force *> $null"

-c "cd {{$FullBaseDir}} && wget -qO iw4x.dll https://github.com/iw4x/iw4x-client/releases/latest/download/iw4x.dll || { echo \"Download of latest IW4x client DLL failed from GitHub. Aborting\"; exit 1; }"

-NoProfile -Command "$ProgressPreference='SilentlyContinue'; [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12; Set-Location '{{$FullBaseDir}}'; try { Invoke-WebRequest -Uri 'https://github.com/iw4x/iw4x-client/releases/latest/download/iw4x.dll' -OutFile 'iw4x.dll' -UseBasicParsing -ErrorAction Stop } catch { Write-Error 'Download of latest IW4x client DLL failed from GitHub. Aborting'; exit 1 }"

-NoProfile -Command "Set-Location -Path '{{$FullBaseDir}}'; if ($dir = Get-ChildItem -Directory -Filter 'launcher-*-x86_64-windows' | Select-Object -First 1) { $exe = Join-Path $dir.FullName 'iw4x-launcher.exe'; if (Test-Path $exe) { Move-Item $exe $PWD -Force *>$null }; Remove-Item $dir.FullName -Recurse -Force *>$null }"

-c "cd call-of-dutymw2 && [[ -f winetricks ]] && rm -f winetricks; wget -q https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Winetricks/winetricks/refs/tags/20250102/src/winetricks && chmod +x winetricks; export WINEPREFIX=\"{{$FullRootDir}}.wine\"; export WINEARCH=win32; export XDG_RUNTIME_DIR=/tmp; ./winetricks sound=disabled > winescript_log.txt 2>&1"
